artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Blue dominates. Plain weave or Twill variation. Similar to Pomegranate. Blue, drk teal & olive warp. Drk blue & green, metallic blue weft. Plain weave variation. Staple to a glossy, 8.5x11" Larsen card. "H-8B" written at top. "#3" under textile. (blue, green, olive)
